title: Tell me about a gift you received.

korean: 작년 생일 때 여자친구한테 받은 선물이 정말 기억에 남아요.
그때 저희가 사귄 지 1년쯤 됐을 때였거든요.
여자친구가 직접 만든 앨범을 선물로 줬어요.
그냥 앨범이 아니라, 1년 동안 우리가 찍은 사진들을 모아놓은 거였어요.
사진마다 그때의 추억과 느낌을 적어놓기도 하고요.
첫 만남부터 여행 갔던 사진, 데이트했던 사진들이 다 있더라고요.
정말 정성이 엄청 들어간 게 느껴져서 너무 감동받았어요.
그 앨범 보면서 둘이 같이 웃고 울고 그랬던 기억이 나요.
돈으로는 살 수 없는, 정말 특별한 선물이었어요.
지금도 가끔 그 앨범 꺼내서 보곤 해요.
선물은 역시 마음이 중요한 것 같아요.
english: A gift I received from my girlfriend on my birthday last year is really memorable.
That was when we had been dating for about 1 year.
My girlfriend gave me an album she made herself as a gift.
It wasn't just an album, it was a collection of photos we took during the year.
She also wrote down the memories and feelings of that time for each photo.
There were photos from our first meeting, from trips, from dates.
I could really feel the tremendous effort put into it, so I was very touched.
Looking at that album, I remember laughing and crying together.
It was a really special gift that money can't buy.
Even now, I sometimes take out that album and look at it.
The emotion I felt then comes back to me.
I think the heart is what's important for gifts.
